attributes.action: Bring Back the Death Penalty for serious crimes and terrorism.
attributes.additional_details: The cost of keeping someone in Jail is £40,000 per year.   So 10 years in Jail is £400,000.  These people just don't deserve that much tax money wasted on them, when it could be spent on better things.
attributes.background:
Some crimes committed in the UK are so barbaric and sinister, they go beyond Jail Time.  And deserve the Death Penalty.
Murder, Acts of Terrorism, Rape and Horrible Abuse of fellow humans, especially children and the vulnerable.
